briefTitle: Atomoxetine to Treat Korean Children and Adolescents With Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD)
officialTitle: A Phase 3b, Randomized, Open-Label Assessment of Response to Various Doses of Atomoxetine Hydrochloride in Korean Pediatric Outpatients With Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder

arms.label: Atomoxetine 0.2 milligram per kilogram per day (mg/kg/day)

summary: The purpose of this study is to provide information regarding the relative effectiveness of three different atomoxetine doses in the treatment of Korean children and adolescents with Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD)

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline to Day 42 Endpoint in Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder Rating Scale-IV-Parent Version: Investigator Administered and Scored (ADHDRS-IV-Parent:Inv) Total Score
